title: UI Command Schema
description: Used to validate each packages' commands.json file

serviceId.description: Unique service ID, for building command IDs to reference in code

serviceName.description: Publicly visible name, for docs / UI

command.description: Unique command ID; will be joined with the service ID

name.description: Publicly visible name, for docs / UI

defaultBinding.description: Default keyboard shortcut(s) to bind to this command. See `@github/hotkey` for the shortcut format (https://github.com/github/hotkey#hotkey-string-format). This can be undefined, leaving it open for the user to set.

featureFlag.description: Feature flag gating the command. If the flag is disabled, this command won't respond to events or appear in documentation. IMPORTANT: Be sure to add this to `lib/github/client_side_feature_flags.rb`.
